title: Amber Rose posts video from her hospital room as she prepares to give birth to second child
text:
Amber Rose is in the hospital awaiting the arrival of baby number two.

The reality star, 35, is expecting a child with boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards, but now it won't be much longer until she finally becomes a mom-of-two.

Amber posted videos from her hospital room on Thursday as she prepared to give birth.

'You ready honey?' Amber Rose posted videos from her hospital room as she prepared to give birth to her second child on Thursday

'It's Time!!!' Amber excitedly wrote in one of the videos.

The reality star did not appear in the video, though she could be heard chatting with her family.

'You ready honey?' She asked her boyfriend as he stood by her bedside, wearing scrubs.

'I'm going to say a little prayer,' one of Amber's loved ones said.

The star's family were all crowded inside the room, including Amber's son, six-year-old Sebastian Taylor Thomaz.

About to be a big brother! The star's family were all crowded inside the room, including Amber's son, six-year-old Sebastian Taylor Thomaz

Rock, paper, scissors! Alexander and Sebastian passed time with a fun little game

Sebastian passed the time playing rock, paper, scissors with Alexander.

Amber has been excitedly documenting the progression of her pregnancy on Instagram.

On Tuesday, the star joked she was 'still pregnant' while showing off her large bump in an Instagram video.

All in this: The hospital room was crowded with Amber's family

Spot on! Rose showed off her growing bump on Instagram, while joking she was 'still pregnant'

Adoring boyfriend: Alexander doted on his pregnant girlfriend earlier this month

Amber announced in April she was expecting her second child.

The reality star already has son Sebastian from her first marriage to Wiz Khalifa, and now is expecting a second child with her music executive boyfriend Alexander.

'AE and I are SUPER excited to announce that we have a Sweet little Baby Boy on the way!' She announced back in April. 'P.S Sebastian is soooooo Happy to be a big brother!'
description: The reality star, 35, is expecting a child with boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards, but it looks like it won't be much longer until she finally becomes a mom-of-two.
